alert.note: Alert for Central Colorado River Basin; Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Central Yampa River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Grand Valley; Lower Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 14 at 10:50PM MST until December 15 at 8:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts between 45 to 55 mph. * WHERE...In Utah, Eastern Uinta Basin and Arches/Grand Flat. In Colorado, Lower Yampa River Basin, Central Yampa River Basin, Grand Valley, Debeque to Silt Corridor, Central Colorado River Basin and Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin. * WHEN...The strongest wind gusts are expected early Wednesday morning with the passage of a cold front. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.

area.areaDesc: Central Colorado River Basin; Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Central Yampa River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Grand Valley; Lower Yampa River Basin
